<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.CSMRelationshipService</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Service script-include for CSM Relationship framework and can be used for customizations.</description> <name>CSMRelationshipService</name> <script><![CDATA[var CSMRelationshipService = Class.create(); CSMRelationshipService.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.CSMRelationshipServiceSNC,{ canProcess: function(relationship) { return (new global.CSManagementUtils().getRelationshipTables() || []).indexOf(relationship) > -1; },
type: 'CSMRelationshipService' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-08-18 05:21:07</sys_created_on> <sys_id>9d45b02d77427010d3ef07dc7d5a99dd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>CSMRelationshipService</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Customer Service Base Entities" source="com.snc.cs_base">4f2cce6b47664210cd4e1ce4316d43a4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9d45b02d77427010d3ef07dc7d5a99dd</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-03-09 11:28:05</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
